ModMetaData.description: Important: This mod should be as high on the mod list as possible to work properly! Requires >= Rimworld v1.2.2900\n Multiplayer mod for rimworld. FAQ - https://hackmd.io/@Swept/rimworldmultiplayerwiki Discord - https://discord.gg/S4bxXpv
